```{r}

data <- readxl::read_excel("world-population.xlsm")
```

# Plot the data from each dataset using a scatter plot.
```{r}
# Line Chart
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=data, aes(x = Year, y =`Population`)) + geom_line(color="blue") + ggtitle("Line Chart - R")
```

```{r}
# Step Chart
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=data, aes(x = Year, y =`Population`)) + geom_step(color="blue") + ggtitle("Step Chart - R")
```
